comment: How'd it turn out for you? What changes would you make if you brewed it again? I think next time I'm going to add an ounce each during whirlpool.

I undershot my gravity (1.054) somehow.  So I'm a bit concerned on that note.  Just added my dry hops today, so we'll see - probably a week on the dry hops, then kegging, so I'm still at least a couple weeks from drinking it.
